node.display_long_description:
Have the time of your life working out!

Get full-body cardio workouts synched to the beat of your favorite music. 

Start your free trial today!* 

ALWAYS NEW
Daily releases added to a library of hundreds of workouts

REAL FITNESS
Get face-to-face with expert coaches, strengthen every muscle group & build cardio endurance

THE BEST MUSIC
Workouts mapped to hundreds of songs from your favorite artists

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Immerse yourself in stunning destinations from all over the world and beyond

SHARE AT HOME
Free profiles for roommates and family on your Quest (4 total)

IN-DEPTH TRACKING
Earn badges and streaks, monitor your heart rate and crush your goals

Set up your Membership on the Supernatural Companion App (iOS & Android) and choose from Monthly and Annual Plans.

*Limited time offer. $0 for duration of free trial, $19/month or $179/year thereafter. Cancel at any time. Terms apply. Go to getsupernatural.com for more details.

latest_supported_binary.change_log: Travel to the stunning Bafgh Desert in Yazd in the new Supernatural Home Menu. In addition, you'll find stability and bug fixes throughout, like workout activity posts showing up faster in your Companion App!

nodes.title: Get Moving To Our Best Workouts Of 2020
nodes.body_text:
We have new workouts every day and are putting out our very best to close out 2020 with you moving, smiling, sweating and enjoying yourself.

Here’s a look at some of our favorites:

BREAKOUT ROLE 
Lights, camera, action! Play the part as you sweat it out to iconic songs from 90s cult classic films.

PROS ONLY 
Get ready for the second edition of Pros Only, a higher-than-high intensity mega sweat session that is best described as “ludicrous mode.”

SWEAT SYMPHONY - NUTCRACKER
Command an orchestra as you sweat on the Great Wall of China to the Nutcracker Suite itself.

MOMENT
Travel to Milford Sound, New Zealand with nothing but the sounds of nature and ambient music to keep you company. Take a breath, meditate, or simply hang out and enjoy the gorgeous rippling water.

SHOWER SONGS
Warm up those vocal cords, this sing-along is exploding with joy! Belt it out to some of our favorite Pop Rock maps from 2020.

MOOD BOOSTER
Get ready for an all-out joy bomb! These are some of our favorite Pop maps from 2020 that’ll have you swaying, singing and grinning from ear to ear.

JUST DANCE
It wouldn’t be New Year’s Eve without a proper dance party. On 12/31, wherever you are, however different your plans this year might be than you originally planned, you deserve to move, sweat and let it out as you dance alongside Coach Raneir.

Jump into the workout library and get moving today.

nodes.title: Set Goals, Earn Streaks, and Track Calories!
nodes.body_text: Athletes: we’ve got some major updates for you! Explore tons of new features built to help you set goals, achieve them, and celebrate all your wins. Update your Supernatural Companion App on your smartphone to set Goals and earn Streaks for every week you show up. Rack up Badges and dig into new Stats in your Profile as you keep crushing it. For more tracking, check out Oculus Move in your Quest Library to get in-depth calorie tracking and count all your physically active minutes. The Oculus Team let us know that Move is rolling out gradually for members on Quest 1 and Quest 2 now.

node.reviewDescription:
I really enjoyed my time with Supernatural, I have a week or so left on my free trial.  The coaches are fantastic, music is good for the most part, some big misses there too unfortunately but I can understand the pain of the devs having to buy rights. In a 25 min workout I burned on avg the same amount of calories I burn from a 30 min treadmill run, a little less. So a good supplemental workout or for missed gym days.

Where this app really shines is with the, forgive the term, "coach potatoes" who aren't athletes and have trouble getting motivated to join a gym or to improve their fitness. They will see big changes because they are normally doing little to no daily activity. 

The workouts are fun at first but lose their appeal quickly,  after the first few goes for me, but it's still easy to get into and can be done in your living room. Win. The free trial is a great way to try it out, kudos to the devs for this. I was disappointed my brand new Samsung Active 2 Watch had no compatibility and it seems devs only thought of Apple users here. The only other improvement point for me is I had 2 crashes where screen went black during a load to new song and never came back... this took me out of the mood to workout and re starting the game it had lost all the workout progress! Was quite disappointing but I have no doubts the devs are aware and likely working on a fix.

Sadly, the membership fee will cost Supernatural most of their fans and prospective buyers, myself included. I simply can't pay the monthly fee for a program I might use 1-2x a week (or not at all like this week). People who pay to go to a gym aren't going to shell out another monthly fee for this. Professionals like myself with very little downtime aren't going to pay a monthly fee to use it once and awhile. Finally, it's just not marketed to me, a single male. If I had a family of 4 using this absolutely the single membership fee would be worth it! How is it fair a single adult will pay the same as a family of 4?!

Anyways, I understand the monthly fee model and what you're going for here; but a huge recommendation to the devs:  offer a 2nd payment option, a one time payment. Take away the coaches, and make it a weekly or even monthly new workout instead of daily. Those missing the features will go back to monthly payments! Those who only have time to use the app a few times a month won't miss a thing. It's a win win and you still get paid!  Goodluck in the future with your app!

developerResponse.body: Thanks for giving us a try. We understand the subscription model is surprising. We have a large team of developers, producers and content creators who work to put out a new workout every day. A lot of our costs go into the production of the environments, working with live coaches that guide you through the workouts, and licensing the best music. We hope you can see us as a comparable fitness service to a gym, or other at home fitness solutions, but more fun. :) Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have questions and feedback, and we hope you'll give trial another go.
